targets.expr: avg_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= "ttfb" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap ttfb [$__range]) by (app_name)
avg_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " fcp=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap fcp [$__range]) by (app_name)
avg_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " lcp=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap lcp [$__range]) by (app_name)
avg_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= "cls" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap cls [$__range]) by (app_name)
avg_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " fid=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap fid [$__range]) by (app_name)
quantile_over_time(0.75, {app_name="$app"} |= " ttfb=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap ttfb [5m]) by (app_name)
quantile_over_time(0.75, {kind="measurement",app="$app"} |= " fcp=" | logfmt | unwrap fcp [5m]) by (app)
quantile_over_time(0.75, {kind="measurement",app="$app"} |= " lcp=" | logfmt | unwrap lcp [5m]) by (app)
quantile_over_time(0.75, {app_name="$app"} |= " cls=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap cls [5m]) by (app_name)
quantile_over_time(0.75, {app_name="$app"} |= " fid=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` | unwrap fid [5m]) by (app_name)
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " ttfb=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` [$__range])) by (browser_os))
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " ttfb=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` [$__range])) by (browser_name, browser_version))
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " ttfb=" | logfmt | kind = `measurement` [$__range])) by (browser_viewportWidth, browser_viewportHeight))
count_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= " kind=measurement" |= " ttfb=" [$__interval])
sum(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} | logfmt | kind = `exception` [$__range])) by (app_name)
count_over_time({app_name="$app"} | logfmt | kind = `exception` [$__interval])
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} | logfmt | kind = `exception` [$__range])) by (value))
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} | logfmt | kind = `exception` [$__range])) by (page_url))
topk(10, count by (browser_name, browser_version) (count_over_time({app_name="$app"} | logfmt | kind = `exception` [$__range])))
topk(10, count(count_over_time({app_name="$app"} |= "kind=event" | logfmt [$__range])) by (event_name))
{app_name="$app"} | logfmt
